pageTitle: Comparison of Two Types of Shunts in Infants With Single Ventricle Defect Undergoing Staged Reconstruction--Pediatric Heart Network - Study Results - ClinicalTrials.gov
textBeforeTable: Reporting Groups There were no pre-assignment requirements beyond the initial screening criteria. Significant events and approaches for the overall study following participant enrollment, but prior to group assignment Pre-Assignment Details Subjects undergoing a Norwood were randomized to MBTS or RVPAS at 15 North American centers.
